name: tm45
effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Makes it tough to
attack a foe of the
opposite gender.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Makes it tough to
attack a foe of the
opposite gender.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
If it is the other
gender, the foe is
made infatuated and
unlikely to attack.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the foe becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

and less likely to attack.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then
blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and
attacks on the next turn.
